## MapTileTool class

3DTiles 展示，配合 TileConfigTool 配置结果使用更佳

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class MapTileTool<E extends MapTileToolEvents> extends ToolBase<ToolBaseOptions, E>
```

**Extends:** ToolBase&lt;ToolBaseOptions, E&gt;

## Example

```ts
const tool = new MapTileTool({})

tool.enable()
tool.add3DTileset({...})
```
